<x>This is a test&lt;use entities&gt;</x>

<x>This is a test<use entities with disable-output-encoding></x>
<foo bar="disable-output-escaping=&quot;yes&quot; should be ignored">
<?my-pi disable-output-escaping="no" should be ignored?>
<!--disable-output-escaping="no" should be ignored-->
</foo>
